props.name: as
props.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by asChild.

props.name: asChild
props.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

props.name: defaultValue
props.description:
The value of the radio item that should be checked when initially rendered.

Use when you do not need to control the state of the radio items.

props.name: dir
props.description: The reading direction of the combobox when applicable. <br> If omitted, inherits globally from ConfigProvider or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.

props.name: disabled
props.description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with radio items.

props.name: loop
props.description: When true, keyboard navigation will loop from last item to first, and vice versa.

props.name: modelValue
props.description: The controlled value of the radio item to check. Can be binded as v-model.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the field. Submitted with its owning form as part of a name/value pair.

props.name: required
props.description: When true, indicates that the user must set the value before the owning form can be submitted.
